Text: Add ProgressBar on Find Files to Sort click
Add dialog to modify destinations

Add labels to comaprison dialog. So the user knows which is 'new' and which is 'old'.
Automate comparison (Needs ImageComparison to compare frames?)

Show lot more information on file already exists

Implement fuzzy search
